Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh have a 3-1 record against the Netherlands in the T20I format.
Bangladesh won their opening match in the T20 World Cup 2024 in Dallas.
The Netherlands lost to South Africa in New York recently.
Bangladesh's batting lineup has struggled in spicy conditions but has managed to score valuable runs.
Bangladesh's bowling attack includes players like Taskin Ahmed, Tanzim Hasan Sakib, Rishad Hossain, Taskin Ahmed, and Mustafizur Rahman.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place at the Arnos Vale Ground in Kingstown, St Vincent.
The match is scheduled for June 13, 2024, at 8:00 PM IST.
